name: Champions of Aerial
description: Champions of Aerial is a battle arena fighting game with up to four players where the goal is to under a series of rounds, push the other players off the platform and be the only one remaining, to be the Champion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5500 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Cards
